entries.camp_control_n: This is the controlling device for a camp.  Its name indicates who owns the camp.  If it's called 'Abandoned Camp' then the owner of this camp has abandoned it.
entries.error_lair_too_close: You can't deploy a camp this close to a lair!
entries.sys_camp_heal: While in the camp, medics and entertainers can heal your wounds.
entries.error_building_too_close: You cannot setup camp this close to a building.
entries.sys_cant_camp: You can't deploy a camp in your current state.
entries.waypoint_sent: A waypoint to the camp's location has been sent to your groupmates.
entries.waypoint_camp_up: A camp has been established for your group and a waypoint added to your datapad.
entries.waypoint_no_group: You are not in a group.  There is no one to transmit a waypoint to.
entries.sys_nsf_skill: You lack the skill to deploy this camp.
entries.sys_combat_abandoned: Your camp has been abandoned since you are in combat.
entries.sys_not_in_combat: You can't deploy a camp during combat!
entries.sys_deploy: You begin to deploy the camping kit.
entries.sys_not_in_inv: You can't use the camping kit unless it is in your inventory.
entries.camp_dialog_text: Select the quality of camp you would like to build from the list below.  You must have sufficient resources in order to build a camp.
entries.error_camp_too_close: You cannot setup camp this close to another camp. Please try elsewhere.
entries.advanced_items_added: Advanced camping amenities have been added to your camp.
entries.general_item_added: An object has been added to your camp.
entries.error_in_water: You cannot setup camp in water. Please try elsewhere.
entries.error_inside: You cannot setup camp in an interior. Please try elsewhere.
entries.error_battlefield: You cannot setup camp in a battlefield. Please try elsewhere.
entries.name: camping region
entries.error_too_big: You cannot assume ownership of this camp. You lack the skill to maintain a camp of this size.
entries.sys_already_camping: But you already have a camp established elsewhere!
entries.error_cmd_fail: Unable to create camp. Make sure you are standing, at peace, and not near a city.
entries.error_nobuild: You cannot setup camp in a no-build zone. Please try elsewhere.
entries.error_muni_true: You cannot setup camp in a municipal zone. Please try elsewhere.
entries.error_camp_exists: You are unable to setup camp here. A campsite already exists at this location.
entries.assuming_ownership: You assume ownership of the camp.
